title: Hexxed Branch
summaries: The Hexxed Branch is a Master Mode-exclusive mount-summon item which summons a rideable Tree Mount. The Tree Mount is a ground-based mount; it is unable to fly. While traveling at full speed, enemies in its path will be hit by 120 base summon damage. The Hexxed Branch has a 1/8 (12.5%) to 1/4 (25%) chance of being dropped by the Mourning Wood in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a rideable tree mount
'A wand crafted from the branch of a cursed tree.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
